Find cluster-specific marker genes

Source: R/findMarkers-methods.R
findMarkers.Rd

Find cluster-specific marker genes

findMarkers(object, ...)

# S4 method for SingleCellExperiment
findMarkers(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
findMarkers(object, ...)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Passthrough arguments to diffExp().

Value

list containing:

  • caller = "edgeR": DGELRT.

  • caller = "DESeq2": DESeqResults.

Note

Cluster identity (ident) must be defined in colData() for this function to work.

Examples

data(seurat)
x <- findMarkers(seurat, caller = "edgeR")
#> 3 clusters detected
#> Cluster 0 ====
#> Performing differential expression with edgeR.
#> Total: 80 cells
#> Numerator: 36 cells
#> Denominator: 44 cells
#> Applying gene expression low pass filter.
#> Requiring at least 1 cells with counts of 1 or more per gene.
#> 230 of 230 genes passed filter.
#> Running edgeR.
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.404   0.006   0.410 
#> Cluster 1 ====
#> Performing differential expression with edgeR.
#> Total: 80 cells
#> Numerator: 25 cells
#> Denominator: 55 cells
#> Applying gene expression low pass filter.
#> Requiring at least 1 cells with counts of 1 or more per gene.
#> 230 of 230 genes passed filter.
#> Running edgeR.
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.427   0.000   0.427 
#> Cluster 2 ====
#> Performing differential expression with edgeR.
#> Total: 80 cells
#> Numerator: 19 cells
#> Denominator: 61 cells
#> Applying gene expression low pass filter.
#> Requiring at least 1 cells with counts of 1 or more per gene.
#> 230 of 230 genes passed filter.
#> Running edgeR.
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.435   0.010   0.444
